title: 5 T205's - Mathewson, Tinker, Chance, others - PSA/SGC
author: Centauri

posts.post_title: 5 T205's - Mathewson, Tinker, Chance, others - PSA/SGC
posts.post_content:
Sale Pending on the Matty and Chance.

Lower grades, priced accordingly. The Mathewson is a PSA 1, but not the worst 1 I have seen. This is a chance to buy an iconic card for a low price.

Christy Mathewson PSA 1(MK) - $175 (The mark is a small pencil figure on the top back. Looks like a number, but doesn't really detract from the card, IMO.) 


Frank Chance PSA 2 - $90 


Joe Tinker SGC 2.5 - $100

PJ Moran PSA 1.5 (MC) - $20

Lewis Richie PSA 1 - $20
